sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { emptyCart } from "../../functions/functions"; import OrderSummaryBox from "../order summary box"; import "./style.css"; export default function Confirmation({ userEnter, orderNumber, setPercent }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); setPercent(100); return (
Thank you! Your Order Number is #{orderNumber} A confimation email has been sent to {userEnter.email}. Please check your email box.
Customer Infomation
{userEnter.first_name} {userEnter.last_name} {userEnter.email} {userEnter.phone}
Payment Method
{userEnter.payment_method}
Delivery
{userEnter.first_name} {userEnter.last_name} {userEnter.address_1} {userEnter.address_2} {userEnter.city}, {userEnter.region} {userEnter.zip} {userEnter.phone}
Shipping Method
{userEnter.shipping_method}
); }
